posts.post_content:
Following cards for sale. Pics are listed on community tab pics/albums. Any form of payment is fine and prices are delivered. Also open to any trade offers for any T, E, or  M Phila Nat'l cards you may have. Please PM if interested 
  * T206 Evers $42
  * T206 Brown  Sovereign(bottom trim) GONE
  * T206 McGraw no cap Sovereign 150 sold
  * T206 Willis GONE
  * T206 Huggins Portrait $45
  * T206 Wallace $40
  * T206 Clarke $55
  * T3 Turkey Red Dooin-- would trade for another T3
  * T227 Marquard-- make offer or a trade offer
